gameRecap.title: Game Recap: Bucks 131, Heat 124
gameRecap.excerpt: The Bucks defeated the Heat, 131-124, to improve to 13-5 on the year and 4-0 in East B play. Giannis Antetokounmpo totaled 33 points, 10 rebounds, and five assists as Damian Lillard added 32 points and nine assists. Bam Adebayo led Miami with 31 points, 10 rebounds, and five assists as the Heat move to 10-8 on the year and 2-2 in East B play.
